aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by actions based on tag-value associated with the resource

DescribeLoggingStatus.description: Grants permission to describe whether information, such as queries and connection attempts, is being logged for a cluster

DescribeResize.description: Grants permission to describe the last resize operation for a cluster

CancelResize.description: Grants permission to cancel a resize operation

CreateCluster.description: Grants permission to create a cluster

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by actions based on the allowed set of values for each of the tags

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by actions based on the presence of mandatory tags in the request

DeleteCluster.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned cluster

DisableLogging.description: Grants permission to disable logging information, such as queries and connection attempts, for a cluster

DisableSnapshotCopy.description: Grants permission to disable the automatic copy of snapshots for a cluster

EnableLogging.description: Grants permission to enable logging information, such as queries and connection attempts, for a cluster

EnableSnapshotCopy.description: Grants permission to enable the automatic copy of snapshots for a cluster

ModifyAquaConfiguration.description: Grants permission to modify the AQUA configuration of a cluster

ModifyCluster.description: Grants permission to modify the settings of a cluster

ModifyClusterDbRevision.description: Grants permission to modify the database revision of a cluster

ModifyClusterSnapshotSchedule.description: Grants permission to modify a snapshot schedule for a cluster

ModifySnapshotCopyRetentionPeriod.description: Grants permission to modify the number of days to retain snapshots in the destination AWS Region after they are copied from the source AWS Region

PauseCluster.description: Grants permission to pause a cluster

RebootCluster.description: Grants permission to reboot a cluster

ResizeCluster.description: Grants permission to change the size of a cluster

RestoreFromClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a cluster from a snapshot

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by actions based on the allowed set of values for each of the tags

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by actions based on the presence of mandatory tags in the request

RestoreTableFromClusterSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a table from a table in an Amazon Redshift cluster snapshot

ResumeCluster.description: Grants permission to resume a cluster

RotateEncryptionKey.description: Grants permission to rotate an encryption key for a cluster

ModifyClusterIamRoles.description: Grants permission to modify the list of AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) roles that can be used by a cluster to access other AWS services

RejectDataShare.description: Grants permission to decline a datashare shared from another account
